experience.title: Associate HR Consultant
experience.description: Key Responsibilities in Organisational Transformation:1. Project Oversight: Led the delivery of multiple client projects focused on Workforce Optimization, HR Transformation, Change Management, Organization Design, and Talent Management, ensuring alignment with client objectives and timelines.2. Business Development: Drove business development initiatives by identifying opportunities for new services and expanding existing client relationships, resulting in increased revenue and client engagement.3. Pilot Testing: Executed a pilot survey to validate the questionnaire and assess the clarity and effectiveness of recorded responses, leading to actionable insights for the final survey rollout.
